title: Query Apache Kafka with SQL
author: Stéphane Derosiaux
description: Data users have long sought the ability to query data directly in Kafka, and we’re getting close to finding that missing magic with SQL.
cntitle: 使用 SQL 查询 Apache Kafka
cndescription: 数据用户长期以来一直寻求直接在 Kafka 中查询数据的途径，而我们正接近于通过 SQL 找到这种缺失的魔力。
